about_the_game:
Are you ready for a challenge?

Build your base, place defensive turrets and traps and defend the core at all costs. A fun challenge, easy to pick up but hard to master.



The core has to be protected at all costs. Once the core is destroyed, it's game over. Make sure to build the appropriate defenses around your core so that it is always safe.

The core heals over time, but this process is very slow, so plan accordingly.



One of the core features of this game is the building system. Players are allowed to place down blocks, turrets, traps and other objects. This allows you to build the perfect base with the perfect defenses. Players can also destroy blocks and rearrange their positions.

.

There are various defensive "towers" that you can research, craft and place. This includes automatic turrets, automatic wall turrets, cannons, shock traps, slow traps and freeze traps. Go down the tech tree and unlock all the defenses!



There are many different workbenches, each with a particular function. Go down the research tree to unlock new building items! There is so much to choose from, and this list will increase over time through numerous content updates.



You have infinite lives, however when the player dies they have to wait for some time before they respawn, leaving the base unattended. This is where co-op play comes in handy, so when you are waiting to respawn there will always be someone taking care of the base and the precious core.

So, once again. Are you ready for a challenge?
detailed_description:
You can play the game with a controller!

Chomper is here! You can play the entire game with a gamepad!



We have so many surprises ready to share with the world. We would love and appreciate your support as we get this game ready for early access!

Join our discord!
